Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Columns Crown + ChuChu Rocket! (Europe) (En+En,Ja,Fr,De,Es)
Game.plot: This double pack is a compilation of two Sega games, previously released individually for the GBA:1. Columns Crown2. ChuChu Rocket!
Game.Notes: This double pack is a compilation of two Sega games, previously released individually for the GBA: Columns Crown ChuChu Rocket!
